channel.title: Pages on wroot
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on wroot

item.title: Press
item.description: Printed or digital publications about me or my researches released on press. 14/07/2014 – ToolsWatch Newsletter June 2014 – One year and a half after GoldenEye – Web (EN) [PDF] 07/05/2014 – Em edição “histórica”, FISL enquadra a espionagem na internet 13/02/2014 – Conheça os palestrantes internacionais confirmados para o FISL15 – Revista Espírito Livre – Web (BR) 08/07/2013 – Experiment Simulated Attacks On Natural Gas Plant – Dark Reading – Web (US) 24/08/2013 – Interview – The New Indian Express – Chennai, India 24/08/2013 – Interview – The Times of India – Chennai, India

item.title: Talks
item.description: Upcoming Talks None so far! Past Talks 2017 [December, 4-5] CanSecWest 2017 – Vancouver, Canada – Privilege escalation on high-end servers due to implementation gaps in Intel’s CPU Hot-Add flow (en_US) 2015 [December, 4-5] Forum Goiano de Software Livre 2015 – Goiania, Brazil – Aleph, Open Source Malware Analysis Pipeline System (pt_BR) [November, 5-8] Ground Zero Summit – New Delhi, India – Catch­-me if you can: TOR tricks for bots, shells and general hacking (en_US) [October, 24-25] Hackers to Hackers Conference – Sao Paulo, Brazil – PhysICS – Using physics simulation engine to demonstrate impacts on industrial control systems attacks (pt_BR) [October, 20-22] 4SICS – Stockholm, Sweden – Reducing attack surface on ICS with Windows native solutions (en_US) [October, 14-16] Latinoware 2015 – Foz do Iguacu, Brazil – Aleph, Open Source Malware Analysis Pipeline System (pt_BR) [March, 15] 0x90 Cyber Security Summit – Chennai, India – Catch­-me if you can: TOR tricks for bots, shells and general hacking (en_US) 2014 [November, 21-22] Fórum Goiano de Software Livre 2014 – Goiânia, Brazil – NSA-Proof Communications (mostly) (pt_BR) [November, 5-7] Conferência Latino-Americana de Segurança em SCADA – Rio de Janeiro, Brazil – SCADA hacking: diversão em escala industrial (pt_BR) [October, 18-19] Hackers 2 Hackers Conference – São Paulo, Brazil – Catch­-me if you can: TOR tricks for bots, shells and general hacking (pt_BR) [October, 15-17] Latinoware 2014 – Foz do Iguacu, Brazil – NSA-Proof Communications (mostly) (pt_BR) [August, 27-31] XIX Semana de Informática – Minas Gerais, Brazil – NSA-Proof Communications (mostly) (pt_BR) [May 8] After FISL das galáxias!

item.title: About
item.description: Jan Seidl is a Brazilian extreme Information Security professional, Unix Addict and opensource lover. Speaker at several Information Security, ICS/SCADA and Open Source conferences. Author of the book “Segurança de automação industrial e SCADA” (Industrial Automation and SCADA Security) published by Elsevier/Campus [in Brazilian Portuguese] Currently working as and independent consultant DIY’er Side hobbies: Building robots, drones (terrible pilot BTW), mediocre guitar playing, radio hacking, satellite tracking, random electronics, burning things by accident, burning things intentionally.
